MS MCQs

    Dynamics 365 Commerce

    »

    1. What value does Dynamics 365 Commerce provide?

      Dynamics 365 Commerce provides higher customer satisfaction with a self-service portal and peer-to-peer support options.

      Dynamics 365 Commrce offers AI-driven insights to generate omnichannel marketing campaigns.

      Dynamics 365 Commerce delivers unified commerce across all channels, including sales, mobility, intelligence, and productivity.


    2. Dynamics 365 Commerce improves retail performance by?

      Using artificial intelligence to identify the most promising prospects, identifying which leads and businesses to focus on, and recommending the best next step to help move each customer relationship forward.

      Building a connected service environment by delivering a seamless, end-to-end service experience and built-in intelligence to resolve service issues before they occur.

      Creating immersive shopping experiences, giving employees the tools they need to succeed, and providing data-driven insights to help improve business.


    3. A department store is trying to increase its brand loyalty by creating a consistent and seamless experience for its customers. What benefit might the store be most interested in when considering whether to adopt Dynamics 365 Commerce?

      Its cloud back-end, which brings all the data into one place.

      Its ability to create an immersive shopping experience through technology that allows customers to access the same product and inventory information, with personalized recommendations, across all channels.

      Its ability to give employees access to inventory data from a mobile device, making it easy for them to connect with customers on the sales floor.
